      "  <content type=\"image/png\" src=\"Container2.Photos(Id=1,Type='image%2Fpng')/$value\"/>" +
      "  <m:properties>" +
      "    <d:Id>1</d:Id>" +
      "    <d:Name>Photo1</d:Name>" +
      "    <d:Type>image/png</d:Type>" +
      "  </m:properties>" +
      "</entry>"
